entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
